name: Balsamiq
description: A web based mock up tool for designers
summary: Balsamiq Mockups is a rapid wireframing tool that helps you Work Faster & Smarter. It reproduces the experience of sketching on a whiteboard, but using a computer.
features: Wide collection of UI elements that cab just be drag-and-dropped
Share your design easily to get feedbacks
scenario: When you want to draw a mockup and get customer feedbacks
When you follow a customer centric design approach and need a proper tool for your mockups
